author: Casey Newton
title: Facebook begins sharing more location data with COVID-19 researchers and asks users to self-report symptoms
description: The company’s Data for Good program is expanding. Facebook is introducing new disease prevention maps and a Carnegie Mellon survey.
content:
The companys Data for Good program is expanding
A Facebook co-location map for the United States. It could help illustrate the likeliness of the disease to spread. 
Facebook
Facebook is expanding a program that grants researchers access to data about movem… [+4536 chars]
